title: DS18X20 Component Definition
description: A DS18X20 WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

sensorType.description: One of the supported sensor type strings (found in README).

sensorResolution.description: The DS18X20's desired sensor read resolution, in bits.

defaultPeriod.description: If present, the component form will allow the user to set its period, with this value as the default (in seconds)

forceOnPeriod.description: If true, the user must specify a period (won't be optional in the form).
